title: The face behind the other board members
body:
[With Malicious Metal recently showing us his face and his backstory](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/EEZU6LgN-the-face-behind-the-metal-late-40k-upvote-thread) , I think it is high time we learn about the rest of the Memes and Games boards. So without further ado, this is what I know:

#Worst Mord NA
http://www2.pic-upload.de/img/31007798/MM1.jpg

Gender: Male
Favorite champion: Mordakasier
Age: 41 (like his brother)
Occupation: League of Legends player
Story:
The long lost twin brother of Malicious Metal, Worst Mord NA was separated at birth and adopted by a family in the United States. Sharing his brothers love of metal and malice, he began maining the Iron Reverent. Unlike his brother though, he lacked the natural ability to handle such evil, and his skill with the champion continued to degenerate until there was nobody left in NA who was worse. Thus he adopted the name "Worst Mord NA"


#Melledoneus
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tfOUwfS1Lm8/maxresdefault.jpg

Gender: Male
Favorite champion: Shen
Age: 19
Occupation: Shenpai
Story:
Many a hopeful summoners has wished that Shenpai would notice them. There are legends told about the lucky few who fall under his gaze. They say that if he notice you than the climb to diamond will become a simple accomplishment. There are even those who say that Faker was the first man to fall under the Shenpai's gaze, granting him unique and glorious powers. But while Melledoneus was off noticing others, he failed to notice his own brother: A Superb Villain. He would regret this oversight. 

#A Superb Villain
http://i.imgur.com/WpiaFA9.gif?Noredirect

Original name: A Superb Hero
Gender: Male
Favorite champion: Veiger
Age: 17
Occupation: Super Villain
Story:
Growing up A Superb Hero always looked up to his older brother, Melledoneus. He always gave everything he had to earn his brothers approval. But Shenpai would not notice him. A darkness grew in his heart, and he grew jealous of his brothers fame and bodacious glory. He has made it his life mission to conquer his magnificent brother, a make *everyone* look up to him. A truly superb villain was born.

#RaptorKarr
https://media.giphy.com/media/79qf1N4RJtc8o/giphy.gif

Gender: Don't ask
Favorite champion: Riven
Age: 18
Occupation: Match Maker, Captain
Story:
RaptorKarr is an illusive individual. Never before has anyone been able to get a clear picture of Raptor, but the whispers of the match maker cannot be ignored. Those who stare out upon the ocean may sometimes catch a glimpse of Raptor's mighty ship, and they are never the same again. Love abounds wherever the ship is found, as suddenly lucky individuals gain clear insight on who their soul mate is. 



#King Odarth
http://image.blingee.com/images14/content/output/2007/10/11/227486614_bbccc5c5.gif

Note: Mistranslation led to confusion, making people think Odarth was his last name. He is actually the King *of* Odarth.
Gender: Male
Favorite Champion: Gragas
Age: 18
Occupation: King
Story:
Born into the royal family of the island nation of Odarth off the coast of Idaho, the young prince became obsessed with the American concept of memes. He would wake up early each morning to read about doge, and stay up at night studying the adventured of Bad Luck Brian. Over time, his understanding of memes became so impressive that the King to step down early, and place his young son as the monarch of small nation at only 12 years old. It has been a prosperous 6 years, but recently the King of Odarth has heard of a memer greater than even himself. A god sent from heaven to teach mortals how animate their memes to hilarious results. The King of Odarth has made it his life mission to find and learn from this most humorous creature. He must find the Laughing Fish.

#Laughing Fish
http://i.imgur.com/H1DDiZW.jpg?Noredirect
Gender: Male
Favorite Champion: Himself
Age: 22
Occupation: Hero of Memes
Story:
As a young child, Laughing Fish was always different. While other children completed useless tasks like learning mathematics or training in sports, Laughing Fish knew the truth: If a man does not laugh, a man does not truly live. Trying to understand what drives humor forward, the child opened his mind to the internet itself. The entirety of the world's cat puns and dank memes flooded his mind, and the boy realized something: The world is a dark place, but it didn't have to be. Taking on the identity of "The Hero of Memes", Laughing Fish introduced the world to a new type of meme: The GIF (Pronounced Jiff). Determined to spread happiness and cheer wherever he goes, Laughing Fish has become a force for good in a decreasingly dank world.

Well she is my fiancée until she changes her name to Queen Odarth then we're hitched officially in the league world.

>she is my fiancée

I was not aware of this. O.O

But hey,

 http://i.imgur.com/WvtPGvm.gif?noredirect

Isn't Emperor technically higher up than a King?
Just asking.

Depends. Emperor is the head of an Empire, whereas a King is the head of a Kingdom. Now, a Kingdom *can* exist within an Empire, and thus that King would be loyal to the Emporer ( example: King Herod of Judea was under Augustus, the Emporer of Rome)

However, a Kingdom can also be the ruling faction of an Empire, and thus that King is the highest rank, and all other factions must obey him (such as the King of England ruled the Brittish Empire).

#LIES AND SLANDER!

Goodness has never held a place in my heart.

That's just a fact, it's not an act, I've always been this way.

But if you are pure evil, isn't it more likely *you* are lying?
https://playlegit.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/im-just-saying.jpg?w=760

Well, the most evil and effective villains are those you are not sure have done anything wrong at all. And let us be honest, how many people do you think genuinely believe I am evil as I claim?

The best place to hide is in plain sight.
